typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	param_FileSystem as string ("container-adf-nido-prod-eastau-100-1"),
	param_ErrorRowDirectory as string ("ErrorRows"),
	param_DataflowName as string ("df_Timesheets")
}
source(output(
		PipelineName as string,
		PipelineRunId as string,
		PipelineTriggerTime as string,
		QueryFinishDate as date,
		QueryStartDate as date,
		approvalStatus as string,
		centreCostCode as string,
		date as string,
		employee as string,
		employeeId as string,
		{employeeRef.No} as integer,
		employmentType as string,
		end as string,
		leaveApplicationId as string,
		room as string,
		roomCostCode as string,
		roster as string,
		rosterId as string,
		start as string,
		timesheetId as string,
		totalCost as double,
		totalHours as double,
		workType as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'SourceFileName',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> sourceJson
sourceJson derive(PipelineTriggerTime = toTimestamp(PipelineTriggerTime, 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss', 'Australia/NSW'),
		date = toDate(date),
		end = toTimestamp(concat(toString(toDate(date)), ' ', end, ':00')),
		start = toTimestamp(concat(toString(toDate(date)), ' ', start, ':00'))) ~> castDateColumns
castDateColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'allErrors',
	outputRejectedData: true,
	rejectedData_fileSystem: ($param_FileSystem),
	rejectedData_folderPath: ($param_ErrorRowDirectory),
	transactionCommit: 'batch',
	reportSuccessOnError: true) ~> sinkSql

parameters{
	param_FileSystem as string ("container-adf-nido-prod-eastau-100-1"),
	param_ErrorRowDirectory as string ("ErrorRows"),
	param_DataflowName as string ("df_Wages")
}
source(output(
		PipelineName as string,
		PipelineRunId as string,
		PipelineTriggerTime as string,
		amount as double,
		department as string,
		employeeId as string,
		firstName as string,
		fullName as string,
		{hoursOrA/DCode} as integer,
		{hoursOrA/DCodeDesc} as string,
		idNumber as integer,
		level1Code as string,
		level2Code as string,
		lineItemId as integer,
		payItemId as string,
		payRunId as string,
		payrunGroup as string,
		payslipId as string,
		positionID as string,
		positionTitle as string,
		room as string,
		surname as string,
		weekEndingDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'SourceFileName',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> sourceJson
sourceJson derive(PipelineTriggerTime = toTimestamp(PipelineTriggerTime, 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss', 'Australia/NSW')) ~> castDateColumns
castDateColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'allErrors',
	outputRejectedData: true,
	rejectedData_fileSystem: ($param_FileSystem),
	rejectedData_folderPath: ($param_ErrorRowDirectory + '/' + $param_DataflowName),
	transactionCommit: 'batch',
	reportSuccessOnError: true) ~> sinkSql

source.sqlReaderQuery: select organizationId from definitiv.Organizations
select organizationId from definitiv.Organizations
select organizationId from definitiv.Organizations

sourceRelativeUrl.value:
@concat(
'/api/company/', 
item().organizationId,
'/reporting/leave-applications',
'?fromDate=',
formatDateTime(convertFromUtc(addDays(utcNow(),-184), 'AUS Eastern Standard Time'), 'yyyy-MM-dd'),
'&toDate=',
formatDateTime(convertFromUtc(addDays(utcNow(),28), 'AUS Eastern Standard Time'), 'yyyy-MM-dd'))

source.sqlReaderQuery: select organizationId from definitiv.Organizations

select organizationId from definitiv.Organizations
where organizationId IN ('DCA2633E-578E-4358-A5BF-0C38A96BB4CB')
select organizationId from definitiv.Organizations

sourceRelativeUrl.value:
@concat(
'/api/company/', 
item().organizationId,
'/reporting/rostering-v3',
'?FromDate=',
formatDateTime(convertFromUtc(addDays(utcNow(),-28), 'AUS Eastern Standard Time'), 'yyyy-MM-dd'),
'&ToDate=',
formatDateTime(convertFromUtc(addDays(utcNow(),28), 'AUS Eastern Standard Time'), 'yyyy-MM-dd')
)
